snippet: Andy Schleck of Luxembourg is recovering from a spinal injury more slowly than expected and is likely to miss the London Olympics, his team said.
abstract: Cyclist Andy Schleck is recovering from a spinal injury he suffered during the Criterium du Dauphine more slowly than expected and is likely to miss the 2012 Olympics.
lead_paragraph: Andy Schleck of Luxembourg is recovering from a spinal injury more slowly than expected and is likely to miss the London Olympics, his team said.

headline.seo: Schleck, Recovering Slower Than Expected, Likely to Miss Olympics
headline.main: Schleck, Recovering Slower Than Expected, Likely to Miss Olympics
